ygData.subject: Ding lvl9
ygData.msgSnippet: Yipie! finally made lvl9 today with my main character! I did say i was going to introduce em all so here is some background info on my first character on
ygData.messageBody:
Yipie! finally made lvl9 today with my main
character!<br>I did say i was going to introduce em all so here
is some background info on my first character on the
Bertoxxolous server (3 days 5 hours played)<br>Name:
Yargon<br>Race: Dark Elf<br>Class: Shadow Knight<br>Deity:
Innoruuk<br>Trade Skill(s): Tailoring, Smithing.<br>I'm glad to
finally have my spells and pet! I love playing around
with pets ;-) Although SK pets are verry weak (con
green always) they are verry handy as an extra attack
or a ways of escape, as a MoB will go after the pet
instead of you...<br>So if ya see me on Berto give me a
hail!
